title: WTB T206 Spencer Boston AL VG'ish
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Spencer Boston AL VG'ish
posts.post_content:
I was looking through my T206 Boston AL team set that I have mounted in my bathroom and noticed the Tubby Spencer has a brown Hndu back.  Before selling the Hindu I'd like to replace the Spencer so I don't have a hole in my framed set.  Does anyone have a presentable (nice G or VG) T206 Spencer you could sell me at a reasonable price (or trade me)?

My tradeable cards are located at:
[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url]

While I'm at it I'm also looking for 
N300 Brouthers Louisville 
N300 Russie
T207 Bushelman
E90-1 Speaker
T206 George Davis with Sovereign 350 back 
T3 Clarke
T3 Carrigan
M116 Hall
M116 Wood
2009 Topps 206 Gold Mini / 50 Mathewson, Gehrig, Mantle
2010 Topps 206 Gold Mini / 50 Mathewson, Cobb, Chance, Evers.
24 different T204's (see my want list on my for sale site).

Thanks,
Mike 
E-mail:  [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]
